title: Bug 2940 - Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA)
description: Bug 2940Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA) MA (01.10.2001 11:38:21)1.
OB: The checkbox state does not update immediately when selecting or deselecting projects for export. It takes a long time (approximately 30 seconds in my case) for the checkboxes to reflect the updated state.
EB: The checkbox state should update immediately when selecting or deselecting projects for export. Additionally, a busy cursor should be shown to indicate that the update is in progress.
SR: To reproduce the issue:1. Open a workspace with many projects.2. Navigate to the export Zip feature.3. Select all projects to be exported.4. Choose the desired file types.5. Click 'OK'.
